summary: Manchester City Football Club, often called Man City, is a professional soccer team from Manchester, England. They play in the Premier League, the top soccer league in England. The team was founded in 1880 and has had many name changes. Their home stadium is the City of Manchester Stadium. City wears sky blue shirts and has won many trophies, including the Premier League, FA Cup, and UEFA Champions League. After a financial boost in 2008, they became one of the world's most successful and wealthy clubs.
title: Manchester City F.C.
